page.title: 20Group Surveying S. Wendron
page.content: Teacher i/c: Mr.A.J.T.Rule. Parents who helped: Mrs.J.Stephens, Mrs.D.Brooks, Mrs.C.Thomas, Mrs.M.Rayner. Children who carried out the survey were the Upper Juniors of Wendron C.of E.School: Lisa Merlin, Hayley Stephens, Michelle Dray, Karen Gronwalt,Hedley Thomas,Nicholas Brown,Michael Brooks ,Steven Skittrall,Andrew Combellack,Martin Trathen Michael Dray Dylan Williams Edward Naylor, Clare Kivell,Georgina Long,Tracey Kivell, Susan Rayner, Rebecca Andrew,Lyn Robinson. We all found the work very interesting. It made us think a little more about where we live.
